events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the software engineer position, including his resume and cover letter.
John Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering due to his software development background.
Assigned recruiter Jane Smith to manage John Doe's application process for the software engineer role.
Conducted initial screening call with John Doe to discuss his software engineering experience and career goals.
John Doe responded positively to the screening call and expressed strong interest in moving forward.
Scheduled a detailed technical interview for John Doe with our engineering team next week.
John Doe completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Scheduled HR interview with John Doe to discuss company culture fit and employment terms.
Completed HR interview; John Doe showed enthusiasm and alignment with our company values.
Prepared and sent a job offer to John Doe for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
Received positive feedback from John Doe accepting the proposed job offer without conditions.
John Doe has formally accepted the offer to join the engineering team as Software Engineer.
John Doe has started onboarding activities, including IT setup and introduction to development teams.
The hire for the software engineer role is now officially closed with John Doe fully integrated into the team.
